document.full_text: bankers at citigroup were unaware when discussing the possible sale of chemical company lubrizol corp with the man tipped to succeed warren buffett that he had any intention to buy shares himself, the wall street journal reported on saturday.
document.title: citi bankers "shocked" at sokol lubrizol shares: report
lines_and_colors: bankers at citigroup were unaware when discussing the possible sale of chemical company lubrizol corp with the man tipped to succeed warren buffett that he had any intention to buy shares himself, the wall street journal reported on saturday.
